description: These low-profile slippers make it easier to get into – and out of – snug cockpits. Minimalist design provides little ankle support or abrasion protection, but allows a better feel of river bottoms.5mm neoprene.Thin rubber sole, with a diamond pattern for better grip.Sized in men’s sizes. For a women’s size, subtract one (for a women’s size 8, choose size 7).  Round up if you are between full sizes.
name: MEC Bubba Neoprene Slippers - Unisex
